name: The Great War: Survival in the Trenches
name_original: The Great War: Survival in the Trenches
description:
The Great War: Survival in the Trenches is a RPG game developed by WorldWarGamesLAI522. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play The Great War: Survival in the Trenches on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
